StructureDefinition:
NameFlagsCard.TypeDescription & Constraints
Patient I0..*inv-dh-pat-01: If present, a general practitioner shall at least have a reference, an identifier or a display
inv-dh-pat-02: If present, a managing organisation shall at least have a reference, an identifier or a display
inv-dh-pat-03: At least one patient identifier shall at least have a system and a value
extension:birthPlace S0..1Birth Place
valueAddress:valueAddress 0..1Address

gender S0..1code

deceased[x]:deceasedDateTime S0..1dateTimeIndicates date-time the individual died
extension:accuracyIndicator S0..1DateAccuracyIndicator
address S0..*Address

photo 0..0
contact SI0..*BackboneElementinv-dh-pat-04: If present, a contact's organisation shall at least have a reference, an identifier or a display
